data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Miyagi, Japan. Please, stir the 13,235 believers here to pray for awakening.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Miyagi, Japan

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Miyagi to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 people will die without Jesus in the next hour in Miyagi, Japan.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Miyagi to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Miyagi, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Judeo-Japanese people might believe through him.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Miyagi words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the state of Miyagi against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Miyagi, Japan.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
